_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2013 14:48:04 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of social care users who feel safe changed?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who found it very easy or fairly easy to find information about social care services increased from 55.0% in 2010/11 to 74.0% in 2012/13; an increase of 19.0%. However, as the data in 2010/11 are unweighted, it is more appropriate to look at the 0.2% increase from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Personal Adult Social Care Survey
